1. T:ERR LAMP BODY TEMPCRATURE DISPLAY
2. DMX ADDRESS: SELECT DMX ADDRESS CODE 001-512 WHEN THE CURSOR IS ON 001, YOU CAN PRESS THE AND DOWN KEYS TO SET THE ADDRESS CODE
3. BUTTON DIMMING: WHEN THE CURSOR IS ON, THE LIGHT CAN BE DIMMED BY PRESSING THE UP AND BUTTONS
4. KNOB DIMMING: WHEN THE CURSOR IS ON, THE KNOB CAN BE USED TO DIM THE LIGHT
5. STROBE: 000 OFF; 001-100: 0-20 TIMES/SECOND, STROBE FROM SLOW TO FAST
6. DMX HOLD: WHEN YOU CHOOSE TO TURN ON, THE LAST SCENE WILL BE KEPT AFTER A POWER OUTAGE; WHEN YOU CHOOSE TO TURN OFF, THE LIGHTS WILL TURN OFF DIRECTLY AFTER A POWER OUTAGE
7. SCREEN SAVER TIME: FIVE OPTIONS: 00, 15, 30, 45 AND 60. 00 IS ALWAYS ON, AND THE CORRESPONDING SCREEN SAVER TIME UNIT OF 15, 30, 45 AND 60 IS SECONDS
8. LANGUAGE: CHINESE AND ENGLISH SELECTION
9. 4 DMX CHANNEL MODES
